integration_patterns: API integrations with Electronic Health Records (EHRs)

evidence.claim: Centauri Health Solutions utilizes AWS for reliable cloud infrastructure.
They ensure HIPAA compliance in managing health data.
Integration with EHRs is supported through FHIR standards.
Centauri implements X12 transaction sets for healthcare data exchanges.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on X12 transactions and interoperability indicates alignment with ICP criteria.
